de.javakaffee.web.msm
Interface TranscoderFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaSerializationTranscoderFactory
public interface TranscoderFactory

This factory is used to create a Transcoder to serialize/deserialize sessions to/from memcached. Implementations need to provide a default/no-args constructor so that an instance can be created via Class.newInstance().

Method Summary
 SessionTranscoder createSessionTranscoder(org.apache.catalina.Manager manager)
          Create a SessionTranscoder that can be used to deserialize sessions that are still stored in memcached with the old serialization format (the whole session was serialized by the serialization strategy, not only attributes).
 SessionAttributesTranscoder createTranscoder(org.apache.catalina.Manager manager)
          Creates a new SessionAttributesTranscoder with the given manager.
 void setCopyCollectionsForSerialization(boolean copyCollectionsForSerialization)
          Specifies, if iterating over collection elements shall be done on a copy of the collection or on the collection itself.
 void setCustomConverterClassNames(java.lang.String[] customConverterClassNames)
          An optional list of custom converter class names.
 

Method Detail

createTranscoder

SessionAttributesTranscoder createTranscoder(org.apache.catalina.Manager manager)
Creates a new SessionAttributesTranscoder with the given manager.

Parameters:
manager - the manager that needs to be set on deserialized sessions.
Returns:
an implementation of SessionAttributesTranscoder.

createSessionTranscoder

SessionTranscoder createSessionTranscoder(org.apache.catalina.Manager manager)
Create a SessionTranscoder that can be used to deserialize sessions that are still stored in memcached with the old serialization format (the whole session was serialized by the serialization strategy, not only attributes).

Parameters:
manager - the manager that needs to be set on deserialized sessions.
Returns:
an implementation of SessionTranscoder.

setCopyCollectionsForSerialization

void setCopyCollectionsForSerialization(boolean copyCollectionsForSerialization)
Specifies, if iterating over collection elements shall be done on a copy of the collection or on the collection itself.

This will be called before createTranscoder(Manager), so that you can use this property in createTranscoder(Manager).

Parameters:
copyCollectionsForSerialization - the boolean value.

setCustomConverterClassNames

void setCustomConverterClassNames(java.lang.String[] customConverterClassNames)
An optional list of custom converter class names.

This will be called before createTranscoder(Manager), so that you can use this property in createTranscoder(Manager).

Parameters:
customConverterClassNames - a list of class names or null.
